he.translation[0].definitions[0].definit: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
he.translation[0].definitions[0].example: It was he who first suggested the idea.
he.translation[0].definitions[1].definit: used when talking about someone who may be male or female. Some people think this use is old-fashioned.
he.translation[0].definitions[1].example: Everyone should do what he considers best.
he.translation[2].definitions[0].example: I discovered that Mel wasn’t a he, but a she.
he.translation[4].definitions[0].definit: the written abbreviation of His/Her Excellency, used in the title of an  ambassador
